attributes.action: Raise the Interest Rate as Inflation is getting higher
attributes.background: The Brexit Vote has already raised inflation in the UK and it's best to raise the Interest Rate for the Inflation to go down. Inflation is causing prices to go up and if not dealt with, prices will go up fast.

rejection.details:
Decisions about the interest rate are made by the Monetary Policy Committee of the Bank of England, which is independent of the Government and Parliament. You can find out more here:

http://www.bankofengland.co.uk/monetarypolicy/Pages/overview.aspx
